name: pp_gui_client
description: PutPlace GUI - Desktop client for file metadata management (compatible with putplace-server v0.10.2+, putplace-assist v0.2.2+)

scripts.build: tsc && shx mkdir -p dist/renderer/assets && shx cp src/renderer/*.html dist/renderer/ && shx cp src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/
scripts.test: npm run build && npx playwright test
scripts.test:headed: npm run build && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: npm run build && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-full-workflow.spec.ts
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-full-workflow.spec.ts --headed
scripts.test:bulk: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-bulk-upload.spec.ts
scripts.test:bulk:10: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-bulk-upload.spec.ts -g "10 files"
scripts.test:bulk:100: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-bulk-upload.spec.ts -g "100 files"
scripts.test:bulk:1000: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-bulk-upload.spec.ts -g "1,000 files"
scripts.test:bulk:10000: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-bulk-upload.spec.ts -g "10,000 files"
scripts.test:desktop: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-desktop-upload.spec.ts
scripts.test:desktop:headed: npm run build && npx playwright test tests/e2e-desktop-upload.spec.ts --headed
